title: LPQ Bug
body:
My pc crashes, gets me into lpq. No big deal, I've got some things I can do while I wait anyway.  Except the lpq keeps resetting to 19 min.

 Again... and again.... and again. 

I've been sitting in this thing for over 25 minutes now.... What's going on?

replies.body: That's definitely no good. I don't want you sitting through those LPQ's if they keep resetting, meaning you've technically already waited the allotted time. Shoot me some screenshots showing where it's reset so I can fix this if it's bugging out ^_^!
